level.heading: DOME LIGHT INSTALLATION BUSINESS – DUTY TO NOTIFY THE COMMISSION (ยง1-1522) NOTIFY THE COMMISSION

level.text: A dome light installation business shall notify the Commission by telephone immediately, and in writing within twenty-four (24) hours, of any of the following occurrences:

A dome light which the dome light installation business knows or has reason to know has been reported to the Commission as lost or stolen has been presented to the dome light installation business for installation, repair, or adjustment;

A person whom the dome light installation business owner knows or should know to be a licensee of the Commission, or to be acting on behalf of a licensee, has requested that the dome light installation business engage in any activity prohibited by these rules; or

A person whom the dome light installation business owner knows or should know to be a licensee of the Commission, or to be acting on behalf of a licensee, has attempted to repair or connect any unauthorized device to, any dome light, seal, cable connection or electrical wiring, which may have affected the operation of a dome light.
Any notice required to be provided to the Commission hereunder shall contain, at a minimum, the following information:
The taxicab name and number and vehicle tag number;
The name(s) and license number(s), if any, of the driver(s) who presented the vehicle to the dome light installation business;
The date of the inspection or repair; and
A detailed description of the dome light as described in ยง 1522.1(a).
